name: Route 101
description:
Route 101 is a  2D Pixel TopDown Shooter game.

Pedro is an engineer in a crisis! He has only a certain amount of time to plant and protect a bomb that will destroy the unknown object. Help Pedro navigate through the dungeon in order to complete his mission. He must find the keys to the chambers, switch up his weapons, and collect bullets as he fights the Enas along this journey. When he finally arrives to the last chamber, help Pedro plant and protect the bomb. 

*This game is a prototype that has been created to test out the overall objective of completing a mission within a given time in a 2D pixel game. As of yet, it does not have as many levels and detailed content. Feedback will be much appreciated in order to make further improvements and enhance the quality of the game.
